item.title: What Are APIs?
item.description: Are APIs the waiters? Source: Reddit and LinkedIn No — The waiters are part of Frontend. They are responsible for creating a nice visual and interactive experience such as greeting customers, arranging the tables, present the dishes — like what React or Angular codes do. They will take your orders — like how HTML forms accept your inputs, auto-complete your sentences, or apologize that certain dishes aren’t available. And they send your orders to the kitchen.
